news.content:
ThreeFold Products & Services Updates 2.7.1 Today we present you a round of recent updates to ThreeFold Cloud & Grid Services (live on Testnet), ThreeFold Connect, & ThreeFold Token (live on Production)!

Highlights ‚òÅÔ∏è Backend and user experience improvements to the eVDC üåê New version of Zero OS üëú Bitcoin deposit and vesting via TF Connect ü•û Binance Smart Chain integration (Pancakeswap)

What Now?

  • Read the full release notes
  • Join the Grid testing community
  • Info: Get TFT with BTC directly on ThreeFold Connect
  • Info: Get TFT via Binance Smart Chain

    Moving on to 2.8 Cloud & Grid Services updates!
news.excerpt: Get the lowdown on our v2.7.1 products & service updates.
